spells.name: Confringo
spells.description: Blasting Charm; causes items the charm comes in contact with to burst into flames.

spells.name: Confundo
spells.description: Confundus Charm; causes the victim to become confused and disoriented.

spells.name: Anapneo
spells.description: Clears the target's airway, should they find it blocked

spells.name: Crucio
spells.description: The Second Unforgivable Curese, the Cruciatus Curse; Tortures your opponent mercilessly.

spells.name: Ferula
spells.description: Binds a broken limb with a splint and bandages, tightly wrapped.

spells.name: Flipendo
spells.description: Also knows as the Knockback Jinx, pushes or flips something backwards.
